page.title: 02ANDREW'S MALBOROUGH LEISURE
page.content: {BICYCLE RIDING}I like riding my bike up and down Collaton Road. I ride on the grass in the park. It is hard to pedal because I have got no gears, and the grass is too long. {TAKING MY DOG PENNY FOR WALKS}We go rabbiting with Penny and the gun, and we take Penny for a walk. We are not allowed in the park because there is a sign saying "No Dogs". Penny is a cross between an alsation and a collie. She is black and brown and white. {HELPING DAD}I help polish Dad's motor bike and I had a go on it after school. I got on the back and Dad went around the garden. He put on his back brake and Dad did a skid just before we turned the corner to go to the shed. The motor bike is green and black. I live in{Jubilee Road, {Malborough.}I am ten years old.
